mapper.select: SELECT cm.menu_id menuId, cm.parent_id parentId, cm.slug slug, cm.level level, cm.name name, cm.icon icon, cm.url url FROM cms_manager_role cmr LEFT JOIN cms_role cr ON cmr.role_id = cr.role_id LEFT JOIN cms_role_menu crm ON crm.role_id = cr.role_id LEFT JOIN cms_menu cm ON cm.menu_id = crm.menu_id WHERE cmr.manager_id = #{managerId} AND cm.menu_id IS NOT NULL AND cm.hidden = false GROUP BY cm.menu_id ORDER BY cm.sort
SELECT cr.name name FROM cms_manager_role cmr LEFT JOIN cms_role cr ON cmr.role_id = cr.role_id WHERE cmr.manager_id = #{managerId} AND cr.role_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY cr.role_id
